channel.title: Image Processing on Developer Portal
channel.description: Recent content in Image Processing on Developer Portal

item.title: ESP-Image-Effects Release | Lightweight, Powerful, and Made for a Colorful World
item.description: Espressif’s ESP_IMAGE_EFFECTS component is a powerful image processing library that can do common image processing operations such as scaling, rotation, cropping, and color space conversion. This article introduces the library, shows how to use it in processing images, and provides usage examples.
